ExternalInterfaceInitializerProperties | Methods | Constants
 
Packagecom.amaze.external
Classpublic class ExternalInterfaceInitializer
InheritanceExternalInterfaceInitializer flash.events.EventDispatcher

Handles initialization of ExternalInterface by polling parent page for the availability of the supplied JavaScript ready method before indicating Flash availibility by calling supplied flash ready method.
